### How can it be fixed

:see_no_evil: :hear_no_evil:
In this case, it was the `db.ipc` that was left behind and caused the `Address already in use` issue.

> In this case, it was the db.ipc that was left behind and caused the Address already in use issue.

Which isn't one of the fixes yet. A line that removes that file can be added to the end of `fix_unclean_shutdown(chain_config: ChainConfig, logger: logging.Logger)` in trinity/main

(The end, because we want to give the processes a chance to shut down, first.
